description.displayText:
I am writing to express my recommendation for Camelia M. Cami has worked as a babysitter for my two year old toddler for the last 9 months. She serves as an excellent role model to my young child. My daughter always looked forward to her time with Cami and are always very sad to see her leave. She used to do lot of great art work and read her books and teach her lessons of life. 
She is a very kind and responsible person. She has never given me reason to believe that she could not handle any situation that was put before her. You would be very fortunate to hire her as an employee

description.displayText: Camelia (or Cammy) worked with us 5 months, caring for our 6 & 8 year old boys. Lovely woman overall. She picked them up from school, drove to activities, made them snacks and dinner, supervised homework, played many rounds of monopoly and drew beautiful pictures for them. We stopped her service because we needed longer late night hours.
description.originalText: Camelia (or Cammy) worked with us 5 months, caring for our 6 & 8 year old boys. Lovely woman overall. She picked them up from school, drove to activities, made them snacks and dinner, supervised homework, played many rounds of monopoly and drew beautiful pictures for them. We stopped her service because we needed longer late night hours.

description.displayText: Cami is a wonderful nanny and she was great with my one year old. She's energetic, punctual, and has the natural instincts to take care of your child and put your mind at ease. She does great art projects and my daughter bonded with her immediately. I would highly recommend her!
description.originalText: Cami is a wonderful nanny and she was great with my one year old. She's energetic, punctual, and has the natural instincts to take care of your child and put your mind at ease. She does great art projects and my daughter bonded with her immediately. I would highly recommend her!

description.displayText: Camelia has been wonderful to our family.  Her love for my children is so obvious.  She is kind, genuine and patient.  She prepared meals for all four my kids, cleaned everything up, did their laundry and changed their sheets.  I hired Camy because I had hernia surgery and could not pick up my special needs baby for 8 weeks.  She did therapy with him and bathed him.  She took such good care of my baby and I trusted her 100%. Not only did she care for him, she did arts and crafts with my 3 year old twin boys and entertained my 6 year old daughter at the same time.  She was truly a blessing.  I am currently healed and although I do not require her assistance, I do not want to let her go!! Any child would be lucky to spend some time with Camy.
